text: Yi sabai milera pani timisita amunneâ€“samunne ladna sakdainan. Tara bastiharuka gadhaharuma sarana li'era va parkhalaharuko pachadi (lukera) rahun. Unako apasama nai thulo lada'i cha. Yadyapi timile yiniharula'i sangathita thandachau tara unaka hrdaya phateka (vibhajita) chan. Yo yasakarana ki uniharu bud'dhihina chan
